description:
Girl's Guide to Travelling

If you want to see the world explore untouched and exotic locations then this is the course for you! Whether you're an experienced traveller or not every trip can be a daunting and expensive experience. In this course you'll learn everything you need to know to save money, get the most from your time abroad, and maybe even turn it into a career or lifestyle.

We are both widely travelled - with Louise living as a full time traveller, and Christabel having explored all corners of the globe. We've both lived and worked abroad as well as taken on volunteering placements, studied in other countries, and of course backpacked along some well trodden trails. If you're thinking about taking the trip of a lifetime, or simply taking your travelling skills to the next level then this course is a no-brainer.

This Girl's Guide to Travelling has everything you need to know to stay chic on a budget. We don't believe you have to miss out on any experiences in the name of money saving, but that you can cut corners on mundane things and reuse that to buy once in a lifetime memories. Travelling needn't mean you lose all your glamour either - we're big advocates of smart packing that allows you to still look glamorous and chic for all your instagrams!

Girl's Guide to Travelling covers:

    • Plan an incredible round the world trip
    • Feel confident travelling as a solo woman
    • Our tried and tested secrets for saving money and keeping chic
    • Travel on a budget without missing out on any experiences
    • How to study or work abroad if you can't afford to travel
    • Save money both before, during and after your trip
    • Packing to stay glamorous without taking too much

If you're ready to go on the travel adventure of a lifetime then sign up for our course today!
title: A Girl's Guide to Travelling
